# alicloud\_kvstore\_instances\_engines

This data source provides the KVStore instance engines resource available info of Alibaba Cloud.

-> **NOTE:** Available in v1.51.0+

## Example Usage

```typescript
import * as constructs from "constructs";
import * as cdktf from "cdktf";
/*Provider bindings are generated by running cdktf get.
See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.*/
import * as alicloud from "./.gen/providers/alicloud";
class MyConvertedCode extends cdktf.TerraformStack {
  constructor(scope: constructs.Construct, name: string) {
    super(scope, name);
    const dataAlicloudZonesResources =
      new alicloud.dataAlicloudZones.DataAlicloudZones(this, "resources", {
        availableResourceCreation: "KVStore",
      });
    const dataAlicloudKvstoreInstanceEnginesResources =
      new alicloud.dataAlicloudKvstoreInstanceEngines.DataAlicloudKvstoreInstanceEngines(
        this,
        "resources_1",
        {
          engine: "Redis",
          engineVersion: "5.0",
          instanceChargeType: "PrePaid",
          outputFile: "./engines.txt",
          zoneId: cdktf.Token.asString(
            cdktf.propertyAccess(dataAlicloudZonesResources.zones, ["0", "id"])
          ),
        }
      );
    /*This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.*/
    dataAlicloudKvstoreInstanceEnginesResources.overrideLogicalId("resources");
    new cdktf.TerraformOutput(this, "first_kvstore_instance_class", {
      value: cdktf.propertyAccess(
        dataAlicloudKvstoreInstanceEnginesResources.instanceEngines,
        ["0", "engine"]
      ),
    });
  }
}

```

## Argument Reference

The following arguments are supported:

* `zoneId` - (Required) The Zone to launch the KVStore instance.
* `instanceChargeType` - (Optional) Filter the results by charge type. Valid values: `prePaid` and `postPaid`. Default to `prePaid`.
* `engine` - (Optional) Database type. Options are `redis`, `memcache`. Default to `redis`.
* `engineVersion` - (Optional) Database version required by the user. Value options of Redis can refer to the latest docs [detail info](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/60873.htm) `engineVersion`. Value of Memcache should be empty.
* `outputFile` - (Optional) File name where to save data source results (after running `terraform apply`).

## Attributes Reference

The following attributes are exported in addition to the arguments listed above:

* `instanceEngines` - A list of KVStore available instance engines. Each element contains the following attributes:
    * `zoneId` - The Zone to launch the KVStore instance.
    * `engine` - Database type.
    * `engineVersion` - KVStore Instance version.
